q: The management reshuffling appears to be amicable. Both Larry Page and Eric Schmidt had high praise for each other during a conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his`` best friends''. I believe Larry Page is ready to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.'' Planned Parenthood fired the manager shown in the Perth Amboy video. But it accused Live Action of using`` dirty tricks'' to smear the organization.
